1534520.name: STRAY KITTEN
1534520.description:
STRAY KITTEN - is a short 2D platformer with surviving and hardcore elements where it is described a story about one lost kitten Silver.

As you have already realized, to play the game you have to be a small but brave kitten that has a wish – to reach its home. There are definite various items on every level . Collecting all of them, you can do the next level.
You will meet different traps that’s why you should think carefully about your next step. I am sure that at the end you will be able to help Silver to get home. Go ahead to meet adventures!
